ejb-local-ref.description: This is the reference to the User bean

query.ejb-ql: SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(c) FROM CategoryBean c WHERE c.name = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM CategoryBean c
SELECT OBJECT(i) FROM CategoryBean c, IN (c.items) i WHERE c.id = ?1 AND i.endDate >= ?2 ORDER BY i.endDate ASC LIMIT ?3, ?4
SELECT OBJECT(i) FROM CategoryBean c, IN (c.items) i WHERE c.id = ?1 AND i.seller.region.id = ?2 AND i.endDate >= ?3 ORDER BY i.endDate ASC LIMIT ?4, ?5
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM RegionBean r WHERE r.name = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM RegionBean r
SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(u) FROM UserBean u WHERE u.nickName = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(u) FROM UserBean u
SELECT b.item FROM UserBean u, IN (u.bids) b WHERE u.id = ?1 AND b.item.endDate < ?2 AND b.item.endDate > ?3 AND b.bid = b.item.maxBid
SELECT DISTINCT b.item FROM UserBean u, IN (u.bids) b WHERE u.id = ?1 AND b.item.endDate > ?2
SELECT MAX(b.maxBid) FROM UserBean u, IN (u.bids) b WHERE u.id = ?1 AND b.item.id = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(i) FROM UserBean u, IN (u.items) i WHERE u.id = ?1 AND i.endDate > ?2
SELECT OBJECT(i) FROM UserBean u, IN (u.items) i WHERE u.id = ?1 AND i.endDate < ?2 AND i.endDate > ?3
SELECT OBJECT(b) FROM UserBean u, IN (u.buyNows) b WHERE u.id = ?1 AND b.date > ?2
SELECT OBJECT(i) FROM ItemBean i
SELECT OBJECT(b) FROM ItemBean i, IN (i.bids) b WHERE i.id = ?1 ORDER BY b.date DESC
SELECT OBJECT(b) FROM ItemBean i, IN (i.bids) b WHERE i.id = ?1 ORDER BY b.bid DESC LIMIT ?2

ejb-local-ref.description: This is the reference to the user
This is the reference to the item

query.ejb-ql: SELECT OBJECT(b) FROM BidBean b
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM CommentBean c
SELECT OBJECT(b) FROM BuyNowBean b
SELECT OBJECT(b) FROM BuyNowBean b WHERE b.buyer = ?1 AND b.date > ?2
